course.subject: FINA
course.name: Family Office
course.description:
This course will provide students with a comprehensive and most up-to-date understanding of family office, as well as insidersâ€™ view and practical aspects of family office. The course will address the following questions based on the extensive research and the latest case studies on family offices in Asia and around the world by the instructor:
1. What is a family office and how to set up a family office?
2. What are the financial and non-financial roles that a family office can play?
3. How are Asian family offices different from the western ones?
